name: Bonecruncher's Energy Block
description: Randomly Discard 1 card from your Hand with the highest original Cost and create 1 Elemental Die of your active character's Element. (Only 1 such card can be played per Round)
descriptionraw: Randomly $[K56] 1 card from your Hand with the highest original Cost and create 1 Elemental Die of your active character's Element. (Only 1 such card can be played per Round)
descriptionreplaced: Randomly <color=#FFFFFFFF>Discard</color> 1 card from your Hand with the highest original Cost and create 1 Elemental Die of your active character's Element. (Only 1 such card can be played per Round)
